name: Logstash
tagline: some of my logstash configs for various things, such as bind query logs
body:
### Welcome to My Logstash pattern file repo.
This is a project that I am trying to maintain mainly for my keeping of logstash pattern files for different types of logs that I run across in my current environment.

### How to use
If you look at the [ndtest.conf](https://github.com/tc3driver/logstash/blob/master/ndtest.conf) it will give you an idea about how to actually use pattern files. 

### Current pattern files
Currently there are only patterns for named query logs. I will be adding more as I create them.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
